de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters

Class AbstractFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters.AbstractFileFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectoryFileFilter, FileFileFilter

    public abstract class AbstractFileFilter
extends Object
implements FileFilter
    An abstract FileFilter which provides common basic functionality for actual filter implementations.

    Basic functionality means the capability to control whether to accept hidden files or directories in addition to the non-hidden ones, as well as the actual check whether a File-object is hidden or not.

    Since:
    API 1.3.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Volkmar Seifert <vs@DimensionV.de>

      • isFileHidden

        protected boolean isFileHidden(File file)
        Check whether the file / directory is hidden or not.
        Parameters:
        file - The File-object to check.
        Returns:
        true if hidden, false otherwise.

        Returns:
        the current state of the showHidden-flag.
        Since:

      • setShowHidden

        public void setShowHidden(boolean showHidden)

        Enables to switch the behavior of the DirectoryFileFilter instance regarding whether to show hidden directories or not.

        • true will enable the display of hidden directories.
        • false will enable the default behavior of not showing hidden directories.
        Parameters:
        showHidden - Defines whether to show hidden directories or not.
        Since:
        Class 1.0, API 1.3.0
